_header: I command silence in the pain of forfeiture
Title(s): The Digby Play of Mary Magdalene
_description: The Digby Play of Mary Magdalene — 2144 lines in irregular stanzas

BodDig133.First Lines:
I comand sylyns in þe peyn of forfeteto all myn avdyeauns
                    present general…
BodDig133.Last Lines:
…Now clerkys with woycys clerTe deum lavdamus lett vs
                    syng
BodDig133.Attributed Title: Explycit oreginale de sancta Maria magdalena (f. 145)
